rationale: Oracle Utility Datapump (Export) - Advanced Security requires a license for Oracle Advanced Security to use.
recommended_action: Do not use the "ALL", "ENCRYPTED_COLUMNS_ONLY", or "DATA_ONLY" option with the "ENCRYPTION=" command line option of "expdp"
error_message: Oracle Utility Datapump (Export) - Advanced Security is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Advanced Security
